CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, July 7, 1945, pg. 13, reads: "Honorees - Six Negro captains, three lieutenants, a warrant officer, and eleven Gold Star Mothers were among those honored at the Soho Community celebration here Wednesday, July 4. A number of wounded veterans from Deshon Hospital were also present, but are not shown in photo. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of soldiers and officers, including Tuskegee Airman Major George S. Roberts, Captain Herbert E. Carter, and Gold Star mothers in back row, in front of Fifth Ward Honor Roll War Memorial, in front of A. Leo Weil School for fourth of July celebration by Soho Community Association, Centre Avenue, Hill District, another version
